Passaic.Rothman Center:
Rothman Center is a 6,000 seat multi-purpose arena in Hackensack, New Jersey. It was built in 1987 and is home to the Fairleigh Dickinson University Knights men's & women's basketball, volleyball, track & field teams, and many other sports.
The center hosted the Northeast Conference men's basketball tournament final in the 2004-05 and 2005-06 seasons.
